title: Rebellion
description: Mystery Action set during World War 2. The internment of japanese americans is in well underway. A japanese blacksmith is held captive by the military for his unusual abilities: he seems immortal. But when a mysterious young government official executes his brother in front of his eyes, the blacksmith turns into a grotesque but powerful monster and chaos ensues. And are these strange girls appearing in front of him friends or foes?
author: Tsukasa Monma
